summary: Heavily Inspired by 'Mour - Fully Voiced Halfdragon Follower by Teylin and Mr Cat'
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=5][color=#ff0000][/color][/size][/u][/b][/center][color=#ff0000][center][u][/u][/center][/color][center][color=#ff0000][u][size=5]ALERTS[/size][/u]
[b][size=3]Mod Authors - ‘Teylin’ and ‘4pull’ (A.K.A Mr.Cat)  made the follower mod; Mour - Fully Voiced Halfdragon Follower, which inspired me to make my own follower to look similar to Mour by using the mods they used to create her[/size][/b][b][size=3]

Inspired by the mod: Mour - [url=http://t.umblr.com/redirect?z=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F74511%2F&t=ODg5Njc0MTA4MTY1NDg3MjkwNzA2M2I0MTQ2ZmJkNWY4MzYzMWQ5OSxOdVJrNUY1Vw%3D%3D]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74511/[/url][/size][/b]
[/color][color=#ff0000]
[b][size=4]CBBE Version has Been Released![/size]

If you decide to download this follower mod please can you leave feedback on this including whether the mod actually works or if there are any bugs. Thanks!
<br />I would Greatly Appreciate it if Anyone submits some screenshots because I'm Not to Good at Taking Them :D[/b][/color][/center]
[color=#0000ff]
[/color][center][color=#0000ff][b][size=5][u][font=Comic Sans MS]Description[/font]
[/u][/size][/b][/color][b]Name: [size=4]Alisha[/size][/b]
[b]Body Type:[/b][size=4] UNP Blessed Body or CBBE[/size]
[b]Gender:[/b][size=4] Female[/size]
[b]Race:[/b][size=4] Nord[/size]
[b]Voice type:[/b][size=4] Vanilla 'YoungEager'[/size]
[b]Marriageable:[/b][size=4] Yes[/size]
[b]Weight:[/b][size=4] 90[/size]
[b]Location:[/b][size=4] Whiterun - The Drunken Huntsman[/size]
[b]Combat style:[/b][size=4] Melee[/size][/center]
[size=4]For UNPB - Alisha's starting outfit is the 'Light Imperial Armour'[/size][size=3] (Long live the Emperor! Long Live The Empire!) and she also has an 'Elven Sword' to use in combat, she knows one spell - Healing. 
For CBBE - [size=4] Alisha's starting outfit is the 'Ebony Armour'[/size][size=3] and she also has an 'Daedric Sword' to use in combat, she knows one spell - Healing.[/size]

[/size][font=Comic Sans MS][center][color=#0000ff][size=5][u]Requirements[/u]
[/size][/color][b][size=4]None other than Skyrim Being up-to-date[/size][/b][/center][b]
[/b]
[/font][center][size=5][b][u][font=Comic Sans MS]Installation[/font]
[/u][/b][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=4]Drag files into the Skyrim Data Folder or use Mod Manager/Organiser[/size][size=4] [/size]
[u][size=5]Credits
[/size][/u]Firstly I'd Like to give a massive thank you to Skyla - I used her Tutorial to make a Standalone follower [/b][/font][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][b]
                  [center][/center]                         [youtube]xcHw4sqrrx8[/youtube][color=#0000ff][u][size=5][center]Mods[/center][/size][/u][/color][center][size=4][color=#0000ff][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/u][/color]
[u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos[/url]
[/u][/size][u][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]Eyes of Aber
[/url][/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63680/]Born Dragon Skin[/url][/size]
[/u][/center][/b][/font]
author: Chipmunk
